attributes.action: stop the unfair advance taxation of 50% of earnings for small business and self employed for the following year when you haven't earn't the money yet
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: stop the unfair advance taxation of 50% of earnings for small business and self employed for the following year when you haven't earn't the money yet. Britain needs small businesses and self-employed and whilst in your first year of business you may have a loss in the second year you are slammed with a taxation of 150%. This is surely a huge strain on small businesses and must cause many to cease trading.
